attributes.action: Stop taking benefits from the wrong people
attributes.additional_details:
Target the people who actually deserve no benefits.
As a person currently using the benefit system i know the problems which lie in it. I will be bed ridden for 6 months in the next month and i am apparently now no longer able to claim incapacity. The wrong people are being targeted. Especially those with the evidence to back up their claim. You see people running around that are claiming incapacity because they cant walk and pretend not to be able to.
Target the correct people.
The wrong people are being punished
And many wont be claiming for long
